LJM1R.RG.summary: A/S Latvijas Juras medicinas centrs provides health care services in the Republic of Latvia. The company engages in the general and special medical practice, dental practice, human health, residential nursing care, residential care, social work, physical well-being, and other personal service activities; provision of other education services; and the retail sale of medical and orthopedic goods in specialized stores. It operates an ambulatory health care center, a hospital, a hospital and diagnostic center, and a primary health care center in Riga. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Riga, the Republic of Latvia.
